content.title: Vivah Sahayata Yojana - Madhya Pradesh
content.beneficiary: Registered female workers and their daughters
content.details: The Vivah Sahayata Yojana was started in 2018 to provide financial assistance for marriage to reduce the financial burden on construction workers. It offers marriage assistance for the registered female worker's own marriage or remarriage and for up to two daughters of the registered worker.
benefits: ₹6,000/- provided to the organizer of the mass marriage program (if applicable)
eligibility: The industrial establishment must be covered under the Madhya Pradesh Labour Welfare Fund Act 1982
Application form must be submitted either 15 days before the wedding date or 60 days after the wedding date
Bride and groom age should be 18 and 21 respectively
Applicant must have been working in the establishment for at least one year
If the applicant has availed the benefit of marriage assistance under any other scheme, he/she will be ineligible
documents_required: Application form in the prescribed format
Original copy of marriage invitation card
Self-attested photocopy of Aadhar card and Samgra ID (if available)
Photocopy of the first page of the applicant worker's bank passbook
Photocopy of the identity card/ESI or PF card (if available)
Latest photograph of the applicant and the daughter/female worker/employee who is getting married

faqs.question: What is this scheme?
faqs.answer: Under the labor department of Madhya Pradesh State, this scheme 'Vivah Sahayata Yojana' was started in 2018.

faqs.question: What is the eligible age of the Bride?
faqs.answer: The bride has to complete the prescribed age for marriage (At present, the minimum legal age for marriage for a girl is 18 years).

faqs.question: Is this scheme only for workers/employees' daughters?
Can men also take benefits of this scheme?
faqs.answer: No, this is only for girls/women/brides.

faqs.question: What are the benefits?
faqs.answer: Provide financial assistance to the Bride.

faqs.question: How to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Applicant need to follow the below steps: 1. Applicant need to visit the official website 2. Download the online fill out application form. 3. Submit the application form and required documents with concerned department.

faqs.question: What is the time period to apply for the benefits of the scheme?
faqs.answer: Maximum 60 days from the date of marriage.

faqs.question: Is this scheme only for rural areas or urban areas?
faqs.answer: No, this applies to urban and rural both.

faqs.question: What is the financial eligibility criteria?
faqs.answer: There will be no restriction on income for the beneficiary to get assistance under the scheme.

faqs.question: Is this scheme only for Madhya Pradesh citizens?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is only for the Madhya Pradesh state person.
